description: In a surreal scene, a horse stands at a bar alongside several men, highlighting the absurdity of applying human situations to animals. The setting, a public house, is a notable and novel environment for a horse. The central theme revolves around the common saying 'you can lead a horse to water, but you can't make him drink,' presented ironically in this context. The image features specific elements like a horse, men with drinks, a bartender, and bottles of liquor on shelves. The situation presents a moment of absurd contemplation on the phrase, questioning the ability to influence stubbornness even in the most unusual circumstances.
caption: “Sure—but can you make him drink?”
